title: 9.80P Land For Sale ( No Time Wasters)
details: Genuine & Serious Buyers Only... 9.80 perches bare land in Colombo 05, Vijaya Kumarathunga Mawatha (off Andarawatte Road) for urgent sale, 30ft wide road access, good location, clear deed and all the required documents are ready. very close to all leading hospitals and schools etc. 5.55Million per perch.
